taskbody.context: The following steps describe the installation procedure of , valid for OS X:

step.cmd: Download the OS X Installation package ().
step.info: The compressed file should be recognized and expanded by the web browser (Safari). If it is not automatically expanded, you can expand it manually by double clicking it.

step.cmd: In Finder, move the expanded folder to your Applications folder.
Start , using one of the following methods:

choices.choice: Run sh oxygenMac.shsh oxygenAuthorMac.shsh oxygenDeveloperMac.shsh syncroSVNClientMac.sh on the command line.

info.note: You can start more than one instance on the same computer with the following command that should be execby using the following command for each new instance:open -n

step.cmd: To license you copy of , go to Help Register... to enter your license key.

note.p: To avoid an unpredictable behavior of the cursor, use a fixed-size font, for example Monaco.
